messages.subject: The Hidden Fortress on IFC at 8am ET today!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! Just wanted to give you a heads up that Akira Kurosawa s The Hidden Fortress will be on the Independant Film Channel today at 8:00 am ET. This is
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone! Just wanted to give you a heads up that Akira Kurosawa's
The Hidden Fortress will be on the Independant Film Channel today at
8:00 am ET. This is the movie that inspired Star Wars!

-MissBehavin
